description.narrative: The Centre for Humanitarian Dialogue (CHD) facilitates dialogue with relevant governments, agencies and non-state actors affected by the displacement of the Rohingya, a Muslim ethnic minority group concentrated in the northern part of Burma's Rakhine State bordering Bangladesh. Funding under this initiative supports preparatory work and consultations with key stakeholders to map and analyse the situation of Rohingya with the aim of incorporating this information to avoid further displacement and promote conditions for sustainable return. The total value of this initiative is $0.2 million to be expensed during the 2011-12 financial year.
